column2: Thanks for starting this local trail! You are now ready to begin answering questions.
You have 3 attempts to get each question correct. After the third incorrect answer you will be moved to the next question.
Upon a correct answer you will receive some directions and the next question.
If you are struggling you can request a hint (for a penalty) by typing "hint".
Alternatively you can skip a question by typing "skip".
At any point you can view your answers by typing "my answers".
At any point you can repeat the current question by typing "repeat".
Finally you can revisit a question by typing "change".
When you're ready type "start" to begin the game.
